# [CHECKLIST_TYPE] Checklist: [FEATURE_NAME]

**Purpose**: [Clear, single-sentence description of what this checklist validates]  
**Created**: [YYYY-MM-DD]  
**Feature Reference**: [Relative link to spec.md or feature directory]

**Generated By**: `/speckit.checklist`  
**Source Inputs**:
- spec.md
- plan.md
- tasks.md (if present)

---

## Usage Rules (MANDATORY)

- This checklist is **authoritative for validation**
- All items MUST be evaluated
- Items must be marked explicitly:
  - `[x]` = satisfied
  - `[ ]` = not satisfied
  - `[!]` = blocked / requires clarification
- Any `[!]` item MUST include a short explanation

Agents MAY NOT:
- Remove checklist items
- Renumber checklist items
- Mark items complete without verification
- Invent requirements not present in specs or plans

---

- REMOVE all placeholder categories
- GENERATE real categories based on feature context
- REPLACE all CHK### items with concrete, verifiable checks
- ENSURE every item maps to an explicit requirement, contract, or test

NO PLACEHOLDER TEXT MAY REMAIN IN A GENERATED CHECKLIST.

- Specs: `specs/[feature]/spec.md`
- Plan: `specs/[feature]/plan.md`
- Tests: `tests/[relevant_file].py`
- Contracts: `specs/[feature]/contracts/`
